research_list.name: Sanan Semiconductor
research_list.market_position: Active in the silicon carbide segment, showcased products at SEMICON Taiwan 2023.
research_list.future_outlook: Promising growth expected due to increasing demand for SiC in electric vehicles and renewable energy.
research_list.investment_potential: Strong opportunity aligned with industry growth trends.

research_list.name: Emerging Innovative Semiconductor Companies
research_list.market_position: Part of Taiwan's expanding semiconductor ecosystem with increased private-public collaboration.
research_list.future_outlook: Growth driven by investments in new technologies and fabs, with expected robust industry expansion.
research_list.investment_potential: Compelling opportunities as the sector attracts significant capital and bolsters innovation.
